EmailTemplate.name: OpenStack Summit Pre Event.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Going To The OpenStack Summit? Find Us At Booth T12!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-openstack-summit-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=openstack-summit-sweeps&utm_content=05052015> Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, Are you heading to the OpenStack Summit in Vancouver? If so we'd love to see you!
Our very own Eric Wright will be speaking during the vBrownBag session on Wednesday, May 20th at 9AM titled "OpenStack-Views from the Market & Reactions from the Community" make sure to check it out. After the session don't forget to stop by booth T12 for some exciting giveaways including your chance to win a VMTurboStack Homelab! See you there. -The VMTurbo Team
